name: Snowflake in the Wind
description:
This is my entry to  My First Game Jam Winter 2020. 

Its about the adventures of a snowflake who went looking for its friends...

Its playable on desktop and mobile browsers.

It has very simple controls, just tap on buttons or anywhere on the screen,

even young kids can play it!

It only has 5 levels, four of them  are tutorials, but  I plan to add more levels in the near future...
